mdRecord.dcterms:title: Akers Family Cemetery-Alum ridge
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located on top of the hill, 300 yards through a field, at the intersection of Alum Ridge Rd. and Dusty Rock Rd. Property is gated and terrain is rough. Probably best to park at gate and walk. General area can be seen on Google Earth/Google Maps. N 36 58.283' W 80 26.619'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
